pages.text: Huskies were originally bred for multiple purposes, including sled dogs, reindeer herding, and companion and guard dogs.$(br2)Standing just under a block tall, these snow-loving dogs come in five different coats.
These dogs are most commonly found in open snowy biomes. They can also be found in snowy taigas and ice spikes, and more rarely in groves.
pages.title: Location
Taming
pages.text: These dogs can be tamed with a Salmon Treat.
